message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a price of $150. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for the best possible price. While I'm confident in the value of my product, I'm willing to come down to $135. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $125. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
